Plot: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.
Title: Closer
Actors: Julia Roberts, Jude Law, Natalie Portman, Clive Owen
tomatoConsensus: Closer's talented cast and Mike Nichols' typically assured direction help smooth a bumpy journey from stage to screen.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 45 nominations.
